uk.co.mccann.socialpeek.interfaces
Interface Peekable

All Known Subinterfaces:
SocialService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSocialService, DeliciousService, TwitterService
public interface Peekable

Peekable Services should implement this interface.

Dave Shanley
